attributes.action: Reject Tony Blair for the position of President of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair has lied about a referendum on the Lisbon Constitution (Treaty) and is not a trustworthy person to be in a position with potentially vast power.

We wish of a referendum on our membership of the EU before any Presidential election is run.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
